mapper.update: UPDATE HANJU_USER SET PASSWORD=#{password}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email}, BIRTHDAY=TO_DATE(#{birthday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ZIPNO=#{zipNo}, ROADADDRPART1=#{roadAddrPart1}, ADDRDDETAIL=#{addrDetail} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT C.PARENT_CODE TYPE, F.CDATETIME CDATETIME, P.PRICE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_ID, I.FILE_PATH, CASE WHEN NS.SELL_ID IS NULL THEN P.PRODUCT_ID ELSE NS.SELL_ID END AS FK_ID FROM HANJU_FAVORITE F INNER JOIN HANJU_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = F.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_IMAGE I ON I.FK_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN HANJU_CODE C ON P.TYPE = C.CODE LEFT JOIN HANJU_NORMAL_SELL NS ON NS.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND I.FILE_STATUS = 'T'
